name: Find Your Girlfriend
description:
It's Friday 13th. You're picking your girlfriend up from the school where she works. But she isn't in her classroom, and nobody else is around...

Can you find her without getting lost, spooked, or otherwise detained? And when you find her, will everything be as it seems?

-

A Twine game for the Haunted Rainbow Game Jam. There are so many story branches and several different endings, folks! Try and collect 'em all...

Content notes: the game contains horror, bees, abandoned dark buildings, a little bit of blood, some nightmares, and general spookiness. Please feel free to message me if you have any concerns and I can provide more detail.

Cover image credit: soumya_p on flickr
